extension.summary: Plays random videos from all sorts of lists.
extension.description: This add-on can quickly play random episodes from TV shows, movies from genres/sets/years/tags, and videos from playlists, the filesystem, and just about anything else, other than plugins.
extension.news: v2.0.0 (2021-01-29) - Kodi 19 Matrix / Python 3 compatibility. Breaks compatibility with previous versions of Kodi.

extension.summary: This service notifies you of stinger scenes in the currently playing movie.
extension.description: This add-on notifies you of stinger scenes in the current movie, popping up a notification when the credits roll. It uses tags to identify movies that have a stinger scene, which can be automatically added by the Universal Movie Scraper from The Movie Database.
extension.disclaimer: This add-on requires the tags 'aftercreditsstinger' and/or 'duringcreditsstinger' on movies with a stinger scene.
extension.summary: Ta usługa powiadamia o dodatkowych scenach po napisach końcowych w aktualnie odtwarzanym filmie.
extension.description: Ten dodatek powiadamia o dodatkowych scenach po napisach końcowych w aktualnie odtwarzanym filmie, wyświetlając powiadomienie podczas napisów końcowych. Do tego celu używa tagów aby zidentyfikować filmy posiadające takie sceny. Tagi mogą być automatycznie dodawane przez Universal Movie Scraper z bazy The Movie Database. Dodatek może również wysyłać zapytania do bazy ChapterDb aby zidentyfikować moment wyświetlania końcowych napisów, jeśli odtwarzany film nie zawiera osadzonych informacji o rozdziałach.
extension.disclaimer: Ten dodatek wymaga tagów 'aftercreditsstinger' i/lub 'duringcreditsstinger' w filmach ze scenami występującymi w trakcie lub po napisach końcowych.
extension.news: v2.0.0 (2021-01-31) - Kodi 19 Matrix / Python 3 compatibility. Breaks compatibility with previous versions of Kodi. - remove ChapterDB

item.label: Mark as watched again
item.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(disablecontext:service.tweak.lastplayed) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, musicvideo)] + Integer.IsGreater(ListItem.PlayCount, 0)

item.label: Remove one watch count
item.visible: !Skin.HasSetting(disablecontext:service.tweak.lastplayed) + [String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, movie) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBTYPE, musicvideo)] + Integer.IsGreater(ListItem.PlayCount, 1)

extension.summary: Several tools to manage watched status and last played time.
extension.description: Includes context items "Mark as watched again" and "Remove one watch count" under "Manage...", and a service that changes the last played time for videos to update only if at least a small portion has actually been played, hopefully improving the usefulness of lists and add-ons using this timestamp.
